organizationId.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.

serviceId.description: ID of the service to update password.

newPasswordHash.description: Optional password hash. Used to avoid password transmission over network. If not provided a new password is generated and is provided in the response. Otherwise this hash is used. Algorithm: echo -n "yourpassword" | sha256sum | tr -d '-' | xxd -r -p | base64

newDoubleSha1Hash.description: Optional double SHA1 password hash for MySQL protocol. If newPasswordHash is not provided this key will be ignored and the generated password will be used. Algorithm: echo -n "yourpassword" | sha1sum | tr -d '-' | xxd -r -p | sha1sum | tr -d '-'
